thread.title: BRIEF-Affecto continues to maintain and operate Finnish Land Parcel Identification System
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Affecto continues to maintain and operate Finnish Land Parcel Identification System

title: BRIEF-Affecto continues to maintain and operate Finnish Land Parcel Identification System
text:
BRIEF-Affecto continues to maintain and operate Finnish Land Parcel Identification System Sept 11 
Sept 11 Affecto Plc : 
* The Finnish Agency for Rural Affairs has exercised the option to have Affecto's subsidiary Karttakeskus to maintain and operate the Finnish Land Parcel Identification System also in 2016-2018 
* The total revenue impact of the exercised option is about 2.8 million euros ($3.15 million) during years 2016-2018 Source text for Eikon: 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8879 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
